selectedVerses.text: He makes peace in your borders; he fills you with the finest of the wheat.
he will not let me get my breath, but fills me with bitterness.
Let the sea roar, and all that fills it; let the field exult, and everything in it!
When I make the land of Egypt desolate, and when the land is desolate of all that fills it, when I strike down all who dwell in it, then they will know that I am the LORD.
Draw near, O nations, to hear, and give attention, O peoples! Let the earth hear, and all that fills it; the world, and all that comes from it.
